body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.textVersion: Audio for 你今年多大？Nǐ jīnnián duōdà?

body.quiz: Which of the following has the correct word order as a response to the question in the audio?
body.answer: 我今年十五岁。Wǒ jīnnián shíwǔ suì.
options: 十五岁我今年。Shíwǔ suì wǒ jīnnián.
今年十五岁我。Jīnnián shíwǔ suì wǒ.
十五岁今年我。Shíwǔ suì jīnnián wǒ.
body.correct: Job well done! For the question ”你今年多大？Nǐ jīnnián duōdà? How old are you this year?”; the proper word order in the response would be “I + this year + 15 + years old.”
body.incorrect: Very close. Pay attention to both characters in the word and what the combination means.

body.textVersion: Audio for 你哪一年出生？Nǐ nǎyìnián chūshēng?

body.quiz: Which of the following is an appropriate response to the question in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 我二零零八年出生。 Wǒ èr líng líng bā nián chūshēng
options: Audio for 我二十十八年出生。 Wǒ èrshí shíbā nián chūshēng.
Audio for 我的电话号码是531-2928。 Wǒde diànhuà hàomǎ shì wǔ sān yī èr jiǔ èr bā.
Audio for 我今年十三岁。 Wǒ jīnnián shísān suì
body.correct: Fantastic job! The question in the audio “你哪一年出生？Nǐ nǎyìnián chūshēng?” means “What year were you born?”, and the proper response to it is ”我二零零八年出生。Wǒ èr líng líng bā nián chūshēng. This means, “I was born in year two zero zero eight.” Remember that the digits in a year need to be said digit-by-digit individually.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again to understand the question. Pay attention to each syllable as it’s a relatively long sentence. Listen to it repeatedly if you need to.

body.textVersion: Audio for 我今年…岁 Wǒ jīnnián .. suì.

body.quiz: In the sentence structure in the audio, which word cannot be omitted at any time?
options: None of the words can be omitted.
body.correct: Wonderful job! 今年 jīnnián (this year) and 岁 suì (years old) can be omitted (when the age is not a single digit number).
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to this single-syllable word, and think about what it means, what function it can serve, and where to place it in a sentence.
